meanings.definition: The act of sweeping back or away.
meanings.sent1: She performed the sweepbacks of the fallen leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent2: His swift sweepbacks with the broom cleared the path in no time.
meanings.sent3: The sweepbacks of the curtains revealed a hidden door behind.
meanings.sent4: The sweepbacks of the waves against the shore created a calming rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The sweepbacks of the wind carried the scent of flowers through the air.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is brushed or styled back away from the face.
meanings.sent1: Her elegant updo featured beautiful sweepbacks framing her face.
meanings.sent2: He preferred short hair with subtle sweepbacks for a neat look.
meanings.sent3: The sweepbacks of her ponytail gave her a sophisticated appearance.
meanings.sent4: The sweepbacks of his hair accentuated his strong jawline.
meanings.sent5: The sweepbacks of her bangs added a touch of glamour to her style.

meanings.definition: The design of an aircraft wing that angles back from the fuselage.
meanings.sent1: The aerodynamic sweepbacks of the wings improved the plane's performance.
meanings.sent2: The engineer studied the sweepbacks of the wing to enhance stability.
meanings.sent3: The sweepbacks of the aircraft wing made it look sleek and modern.
meanings.sent4: The sweepbacks of the wing resembled the shape of a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The sweepbacks of the wing reduced drag and increased efficiency during flight.
